name: Ratify
body:
Ratify lets you use your device as the second factor with services that support TOTP (2-Step Verification)

Some popular services that support TOTP:

* [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/account#security)
* [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/settings?tab=security&section=code_generator&view)
* [Google](https://accounts.google.com/b/0/SmsAuthSettings#devices)
* [Microsoft](https://account.live.com/proofs/EnableTfa)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
